trans-unit.source: Represents the access control and audit security for a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Representerer tilgangskontroll og overvåking sikkerhet for en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemSecurity class is the base class for the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> classes.
trans-unit.target: Klassen FileSystemSecurity er basisklasse for den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>og <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>klasser.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: These classes represent all of the access rights for a system file or directory and define how access attempts are audited.
trans-unit.target: Disse klassene representerer alle tilgangsrettigheter for en systemfil eller mappe og mappene definerer hvordan forsøk på tilgang overvåkes.

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemSecurity class represents access and audit rights as a set of rules.
trans-unit.target: Klassen FileSystemSecurity representerer tilgang og audit som et sett med regler.

trans-unit.source: Each access rule is represented by a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> object, while each audit rule is represented by a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> object.
trans-unit.target: Hver tilgangsregel er representert av en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>objektet, mens hver regel for sporing av endringer er representert av en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>objektet.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemSecurity class is an abstraction of the underlying Microsoft Windows file security system.
trans-unit.target: Klassen FileSystemSecurity er en abstrakt av underliggende Microsoft Windows sikkerhet filsystemet.

trans-unit.source: In this system, each file or directory has a discretionary access control list (DACL), which controls access to the file or directory, and a system access control list (SACL), which specifies the access control attempts that are audited.
trans-unit.target: Hver fil eller mappe er en vilkårlig tilgangskontrolliste (DACL), som kontrollerer tilgang til filen eller mappen, og en system tilgangskontrolliste (SACL) som angir access control forsøk som overvåkes i dette systemet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> classes are abstractions of access control entries (ACEs) that comprise DACLs and SACLs.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>og <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>klasser er abstraksjoner tilgangskontrolloppføringer (tilgangskontrolloppføringer) som utgjør DACL og SACL.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemSecurity class hides many of details of DACLs and SACLs; you do not have to worry about ACE ordering or null DACLS.
trans-unit.target: Klassen FileSystemSecurity skjuler mange av informasjon om DACL og SACL; du har ikke bekymre TILGANGSKONTROLLISTEN sortering eller null DACL.

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed access control list (ACL) information to a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede listen (ACL) informasjon om tilgangskontroll til en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede ACL-informasjon til en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the enumeration that the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity"></xref> class uses to represent access rights.
trans-unit.target: Henter opplistingen som den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity"> </xref> klasse bruker til å representere tilgangsrettigheter.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> class override the AccessRightType property and return the type they use to represent access rights.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>klassen overstyrer egenskapen AccessRightType og returtype de bruker til å representere tilgangsrettigheter.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>

trans-unit.source: When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct enumeration type to use with each security object.
trans-unit.target: Når du arbeider med matriser eller samlinger som inneholder flere objekttyper sikkerhet, kan du bruke denne egenskapen til å bestemme den riktige opplistingstypen til bruk med hver sikkerhetsobjekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object representing the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>objektet som representerer den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"> </xref> opplisting.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> class that represents a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"> </xref> klasse som representerer en ny tilgangsregel for kontrollen for den angitte brukeren, med den angitte tilgangsrettigheter tilgangskontroll og flagg.

trans-unit.source: The recommended way to create access control rules is to use the constructors of the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> class.
trans-unit.target: Den anbefalte måten å opprette tilgangsregler for kontrollen er å bruke konstruktører for <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>klasse.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>

trans-unit.source: The return type of the AccessRuleFactory method is the base class, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule>, but the return value can be cast safely to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Returtypen for metoden AccessRuleFactory er basisklassen, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule>, men returverdien kan brukes bare som den utledede klassen.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that represents a user account.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objektet som representerer en brukerkonto.

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies an access type.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som angir en access-type.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the access rule is inherited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilgangsregelen arves; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to propagate access masks to child objects.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref> verdier som angir hvordan å overføre Tilgangsmasker til underordnede objekter.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to propagate Access Control Entries (ACEs) to child objects.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"> </xref> verdier som angir hvordan å overføre tilgangskontrolloppføringer (tilgangskontrolloppføringer) til underordnede objekter.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> values that specifies whether access is allowed or denied.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"> </xref> verdier som angir om tilgang er tillatt, eller har avslått.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> object that represents a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"> </xref> objektet som representerer en ny tilgangsregel for kontrollen for den angitte brukeren, med den angitte tilgangsrettigheter tilgangskontroll og flagg.

trans-unit.source: The accessMask, inheritanceFlags, propagationFlags, or type parameters specify an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: The accessMask, inheritanceFlags, propagationFlags, or type parameters specify an invalid value.

trans-unit.source: The identityReference parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The identityReference parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The accessMask parameter is zero.
trans-unit.target: - eller - accessMask parameteren er null.

trans-unit.source: The identityReference parameter is neither of type , nor of a type such as that can be converted to type .
trans-unit.target: Den identityReference parameteren er verken type , eller en type som som kan konverteres til typen .

trans-unit.source: Gets the enumeration that the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity"></xref> class uses to represent access rules.
trans-unit.target: Henter opplistingen som den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity"> </xref> klasse bruker til å representere tilgangsregler.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> class override the AccessRuleType property and return the type they use to represent access rules.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>klassen overstyrer egenskapen AccessRuleType og returtype de bruker til å representere tilgangsregler.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>

trans-unit.source: When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct access rule type to use with each security object.
trans-unit.target: Når du arbeider med matriser eller samlinger som inneholder flere objekttyper sikkerhet, kan du bruke denne egenskapen til å bestemme regeltypen riktig tilgang til bruk med hver sikkerhetsobjekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object representing the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>objektet som representerer den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"> </xref> klasse.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified access control list (ACL) permission to the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte kontrollen listen (ACL) tilgangstillatelse i den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: The AddAccessRule method adds a new rule to the list of rules contained within a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddAccessRule legger til en ny regel i listen over regler som finnes i en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>objektet.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>

trans-unit.source: If an access control list (ACL) already exists for the specified rule, the AddAccessRule method will still add the rule, with one exception: a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> object created using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> enumeration value supersedes an object created using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes allerede en tilgangskontrolliste (ACL) for den angitte regelen, metoden AddAccessRule fortsatt legger til en regel, med ett unntak: en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>objektet som ble opprettet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>opplistingsverdien erstatter et objekt som er opprettet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>opplistingsverdien.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede ACL-informasjon til en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede ACL-informasjon til en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add an access rule without setting the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> flag, the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> flag will be automatically added to your rule.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til en tilgangsregel uten innstillingen det <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>flagg i <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>flagg automatisk legges til regelen.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: If you remove the rule later without specifying the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> flag, the flag will automatically be removed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du fjerner regelen senere uten å angi den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>flagg Flagget fjernes automatisk.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to add to a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"> </xref> objektet som representerer en tilgangslisten (ACL) tillatelser til å legge til en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: The rule parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rule parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified audit rule to the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte audit regelen i den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: The AddAuditRule method adds a new audit rule to the list of rules contained within a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddAuditRule legger til en ny regel for sporing av endringer i listen over regler som finnes i en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>objektet.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>

trans-unit.source: If an audit rule already exists for the specified rule, the AddAuditRule method will still add the rule.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes allerede en regel for sporing av endringer for den angitte regelen, legges fortsatt metoden AddAuditRule regelen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> object that represents an audit rule to add to a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"> </xref> objektet som representerer en regel for sporing av endringer for å legge til en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: The rule parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rule parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> class representing the specified audit rule for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"> </xref> klassen som representerer angitt audit regel for den angitte brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The recommended way to create audit rules is to use the constructors of the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> class.
trans-unit.target: Den anbefalte måten å opprette regler for sporing av endringer er å bruke konstruktører for <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>klasse.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>

trans-unit.source: The return type of the AuditRuleFactory method is the base class, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule>, but the return value can be cast safely to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Returtypen for metoden AuditRuleFactory er basisklassen, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule>, men returverdien kan brukes bare som den utledede klassen.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that represents a user account.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref> objektet som representerer en brukerkonto.

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies an access type.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som angir en access-type.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the access rule is inherited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilgangsregelen arves; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to propagate access masks to child objects.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref> verdier som angir hvordan å overføre Tilgangsmasker til underordnede objekter.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to propagate Access Control Entries (ACEs) to child objects.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"> </xref> verdier som angir hvordan å overføre tilgangskontrolloppføringer (tilgangskontrolloppføringer) til underordnede objekter.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags"></xref> values that specifies the type of auditing to perform.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags"> </xref> verdier som angir hvilken type overvåking for å utføre.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> object representing the specified audit rule for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"> </xref> -objekt som representerer angitt audit regel for den angitte brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The accessMask, inheritanceFlags, propagationFlags, or flags properties specify an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: The accessMask, inheritanceFlags, propagationFlags, or flags properties specify an invalid value.

trans-unit.source: The identityReference property is .
trans-unit.target: The identityReference property is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The accessMask property is zero.
trans-unit.target: - eller - accessMask egenskapen er null.

trans-unit.source: The identityReference property is neither of type , nor of a type such as that can be converted to type .
trans-unit.target: Den identityReference egenskapen er ikke av typen , eller en type som som kan konverteres til typen .

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity"></xref> class uses to represent audit rules.
trans-unit.target: Henter typen som den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity"> </xref> klasse bruker til å representere audit regler.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> class override the AuditRuleType property and return the type they use to represent audit rights.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>klassen overstyrer egenskapen AuditRuleType og returtype de bruker til å representere audit rettigheter.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>

trans-unit.source: When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct audit rule type to use with each security object.
trans-unit.target: Når du arbeider med matriser eller samlinger som inneholder flere objekttyper sikkerhet, kan du bruke denne egenskapen for å finne riktig audit regeltypen til bruk med hver sikkerhetsobjekt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object representing the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>objektet som representerer den <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"> </xref> klasse.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Removes all matching allow or deny access control list (ACL) permissions from the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle samsvarende Tillat eller Nekt tilgangskontroll (ACL) listetillatelser fra den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveAccessRule method removes either all matching <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> access rules or all matching <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> access rules from the current <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RemoveAccessRule fjerner enten alle samsvarende <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>tilgangsregler eller alle samsvarende <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>tilgangsregler fra gjeldende <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>objektet.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method to remove all <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> access rules for a user by passing a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> object created using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> value, the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value, and a user account.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke denne metoden til å fjerne alle <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>tilgangsregler for en bruker ved å sende en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>objektet som ble opprettet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>verdien av <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien og en brukerkonto.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>

trans-unit.source: When you do this, the RemoveAccessRule method removes any deny rules that specify the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value or the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value.
trans-unit.target: Når du gjør dette, metoden RemoveAccessRule fjerner alle deny regler som angir den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien eller <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdi.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed access control list (ACL) information to a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede listen (ACL) informasjon om tilgangskontroll til en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede ACL-informasjon til en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add an access rule without setting the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> flag, the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> flag will be automatically added to your rule.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til en tilgangsregel uten innstillingen det <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>flagg i <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>flagg automatisk legges til regelen.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: If you remove the rule later without specifying the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> flag, the flag will automatically be removed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du fjerner regelen senere uten å angi den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>flagg Flagget fjernes automatisk.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to remove from a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"> </xref> objektet som representerer en tilgangslisten (ACL) tillatelser til å fjerne fra en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the access rule was removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilgangsregelen ble fjernet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The rule parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rule parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Removes all access control list (ACL) permissions for the specified user from the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle kontrollen listen (ACL) tilgangstillatelser for den angitte brukeren fra den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveAccessRuleAll method removes all access control list (ACL) permissions for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RemoveAccessRuleAll fjerner alle kontrollen listen (ACL) tilgangstillatelser for den angitte brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The method ignores all values in the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> object except the user account.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ignorerer alle verdiene i den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>objektet med unntak av brukerkontoen.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede ACL-informasjon til en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede ACL-informasjon til en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add an access rule without setting the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> flag, the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> flag will be automatically added to your rule.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til en tilgangsregel uten innstillingen det <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>flagg i <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>flagg automatisk legges til regelen.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: If you remove the rule later without specifying the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> flag, the flag will automatically be removed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du fjerner regelen senere uten å angi den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>flagg Flagget fjernes automatisk.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> object that specifies a user whose access control list (ACL) permissions should be removed from a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"> </xref> objekt som angir en bruker som har tilgang til tillatelser-listen (ACL) som skal fjernes fra en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: The rule parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rule parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Removes a single matching allow or deny access control list (ACL) permission from the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner en enkelt tilsvarende Tillat eller Nekt tilgang tilgangslisten (ACL) tillatelser fra den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveAccessRuleSpecific method removes the specified <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> access rule or the specified matching <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> access rule from the current <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RemoveAccessRuleSpecific fjerner angitt <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>regelen eller den angitte samsvarende <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>tilgangsregel fra gjeldende <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>objektet.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method to remove a specified <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> access rule for a user by passing a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> object created using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> value, the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value, and a user account.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke denne metoden til å fjerne en angitt <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>tilgangsregel for en bruker ved å sende en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule>objektet som ble opprettet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>verdi, i <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien og en brukerkonto.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>

trans-unit.source: When you do this, the RemoveAccessRuleSpecific method removes only the deny rule that specifies the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value.
trans-unit.target: Når du gjør dette, metoden RemoveAccessRuleSpecific fjerner bare avslå regelen som angir den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdi.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: It does not remove any deny rules that specify the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle deny regler som angir den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdi.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed access control list (ACL) information to a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede listen (ACL) informasjon om tilgangskontroll til en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede ACL-informasjon til en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add an access rule without setting the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> flag, the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> flag will be automatically added to your rule.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til en tilgangsregel uten innstillingen det <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>flagg i <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>flagg automatisk legges til regelen.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: If you remove the rule later without specifying the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> flag, the flag will automatically be removed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du fjerner regelen senere uten å angi den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>flagg Flagget fjernes automatisk.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> object that specifies a user whose access control list (ACL) permissions should be removed from a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"> </xref> objekt som angir en bruker som har tilgang til tillatelser-listen (ACL) som skal fjernes fra en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: The rule parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rule parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Removes all matching allow or deny audit rules from the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle samsvarende Tillat eller Nekt audit regler fra den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveAuditRule method removes either all matching <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> audit rules or all matching <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> audit rules from the current <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RemoveAuditRule fjerner enten alle samsvarende <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>audit regler eller alle samsvarende <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>audit regler fra gjeldende <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>objektet.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method to remove all <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> audit rules for a user by passing a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> object created using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> value, the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags> value, and a user account.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke denne metoden til å fjerne alle <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>audit regler for en bruker ved å sende en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>objektet som ble opprettet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>verdi, i <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags>verdien og en brukerkonto.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>

trans-unit.source: When you do this, the RemoveAuditRule method removes any deny rules that specify the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags> value or the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags> value.
trans-unit.target: Når du gjør dette, metoden RemoveAuditRule fjerner alle deny regler som angir den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags>verdien eller <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags>verdi.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> object that represents an audit rule to remove from a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"> </xref> objektet som representerer en regel for sporing av endringer for å fjerne fra en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the audit rule was removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis regelen for sporing av endringer ble fjernet; Ellers<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: The rule parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rule parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules for the specified user from the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle regler for sporing av endringer for den angitte brukeren fra den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveAuditRuleAll method removes all audit rules for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RemoveAuditRuleAll fjerner alle regler for sporing av endringer for den angitte brukeren.

trans-unit.source: It ignores all values in the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> object except the user account.
trans-unit.target: Ignoreres alle verdiene i den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>objektet med unntak av brukerkontoen.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> object that specifies a user whose audit rules should be removed from a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"> </xref> objekt som angir en bruker med audit regler som skal fjernes fra en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: The rule parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rule parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Removes a single matching allow or deny audit rule from the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner en enkelt tilsvarende Tillat eller Nekt regel for sporing av endringer fra den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveAuditRuleSpecific method removes the specified matching <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> audit rule or the specified matching <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> audit rule from the current <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RemoveAuditRuleSpecific fjerner det angitte samsvarende <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>audit regel eller den angitte samsvarende <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>audit regelen fra gjeldende <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity>objektet.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method to remove a specified <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> audit rule for a user by passing a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> object created using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> value, the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags> value, and a user account.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke denne metoden til å fjerne en angitt <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>audit regel for en bruker ved å sende en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule>objektet som ble opprettet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>verdi, i <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags>verdien og en brukerkonto.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType>

trans-unit.source: When you do this, the RemoveAuditRuleSpecific method removes only a deny rule that specifies the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags> value.
trans-unit.target: Når du gjør dette, metoden RemoveAuditRuleSpecific fjerner bare avslå regel som angir den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags>verdi.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags>

trans-unit.source: It does not remove any deny rules that specify the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags> value.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle deny regler som angir den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags>verdi.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> object that represents an audit rule to remove from a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"> </xref> objektet som representerer en regel for sporing av endringer for å fjerne fra en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: The rule parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rule parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified access control list (ACL) permission to the current file or directory and removes all matching ACL permissions.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte kontrollen listen (ACL) tilgangstillatelse i den gjeldende filen eller mappen, og fjerner alle samsvarende ACL-tillatelser.

trans-unit.source: The ResetAccessRule method adds the specified access control list (ACL) rule or overwrites any identical ACL rules that match the `rule` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ResetAccessRule legger til den angitte kontrollen listen (ACL) tilgangsregelen eller overskriver alle identiske ACL-regler som samsvarer med den `rule` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value and the ResetAccessRule method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value, the identical rule will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis den `rule` parameteren angir en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien og metoden ResetAccessRule finner du en identiske regel for tilgangskontrolliste (ACL) som angir den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien identiske regelen overskrives.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: If the ResetAccessRule method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value, the identical rule will also be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: Hvis metoden ResetAccessRule finner en regel for identiske tilgangskontrolliste (ACL) som angir den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien identiske regelen også overskrives.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede ACL-informasjon til en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede ACL-informasjon til en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to add to a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"> </xref> objektet som representerer en tilgangslisten (ACL) tillatelser til å legge til en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: The rule parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rule parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified access control list (ACL) permission for the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Angir den angitte access-listen (ACL) tillatelsen for den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: The SetAccessRule method adds the specified access control list (ACL) rule or overwrites any identical ACL rules that match the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value of the `rule` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SetAccessRule legger til den angitte kontrollen listen (ACL) tilgangsregelen eller overskriver alle identiske ACL-regler som samsvarer med den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien for den `rule` parameteren.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value and the SetAccessRule method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value, the identical rule will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis den `rule` parameteren angir en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien og metoden SetAccessRule finner du en identiske regel for tilgangskontrolliste (ACL) som angir den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien identiske regelen overskrives.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: If the SetAccessRule method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value, the identical rule will not be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: Hvis metoden SetAccessRule finner en regel for identiske tilgangskontrolliste (ACL) som angir den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien identiske regelen ikke overskrives.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede ACL-informasjon til en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde nye eller endrede ACL-informasjon til en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.SetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en fil, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> or <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å hente ACL-informasjon fra en mappe, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A>metode.</xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo.GetAccessControl%2A> </xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to set for a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"> </xref> objektet som representerer en tilgangslisten (ACL) tillatelser til å angi for en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: The rule parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rule parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified audit rule for the current file or directory.
trans-unit.target: Angir den angitte audit regelen for den gjeldende filen eller mappen.

trans-unit.source: The SetAuditRule method adds the specified audit rule or overwrites any identical audit rules that match the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value of the `rule` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SetAuditRule legger til den angitte audit regelen eller overskriver alle identiske audit regler som samsvarer med den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien for den `rule` parameteren.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value and the SetAuditRule method finds an identical audit rule that specifies the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value, the identical rule will be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis den `rule` parameteren angir en <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien og metoden SetAuditRule finner du en regel for identiske audit som angir den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien identiske regelen overskrives.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: If the SetAuditRule method finds an identical audit rule that specifies the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> value, the identical rule will not be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: Hvis metoden SetAuditRule finner en regel for identiske audit som angir den <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>verdien identiske regelen ikke overskrives.</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"></xref> object that represents an audit rule to set for a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule"> </xref> objektet som representerer en regel for sporing av endringer til å angi for en fil eller mappe.

trans-unit.source: The rule parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rule parameter is .
